publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2918 Mike Pringle: Introduction of Scottish Bravery Awardâ€”That the Parliament recommends the introduction of a specific Scottish award for bravery which would recognise acts of extreme courageousness and altruism such as the one carried out by Edinburgh South constituent, Dougal Smart, who died in November 2003 while trying to save the life of a tourist in Southern Australia and whose untimely death, although honoured by the Australian government, has not yet been publicly recognised in the UK.
S2M-2918 Introduction of Scottish Bravery Award (lodged on 3 June 2005) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-2918 Introduction of Scottish Bravery Award (lodged on 3 June 2005) Fiona Hyslop*, Ms Sandra White*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2918 Introduction of Scottish Bravery Award (lodged on 3 June 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-2918 Introduction of Scottish Bravery Award (lodged on 3 June 2005) John Swinburne*
S2M-2918 Introduction of Scottish Bravery Award (lodged on 3 June 2005) Rosie Kane*
S2M-2918 Introduction of Scottish Bravery Award (lodged on 3 June 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-2918 Introduction of Scottish Bravery Award (lodged on 3 June 2005) Robin Harper* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
